ags:resource.dc:title: Penampilan reproduksi kerbau post partum pada berbagai level GnRH yang disinkronisasi dengan PGF 2 alpha

dc:title.dcterms:alternative: Post-partum reproductive appearance of buffalo at various levels of GnRH and synchronized with PGF 2 alpha

dc:creator.ags:creatorCorporate: Universitas Islam Negeri Sultan Syarif Kasim

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: A study of reproductive performance of buffalo treated with levels of GnRH was conducted on twenty buffaloes of Kampar. The animals were divided into five groups. Group 1 received 200 micron g GnRH, the second group received 250 microng GnRH, the third group received 300 micron g GnRH, the fourth group received 350 micron g GnRH and the fifth group received 400 micron g GnRH. Each group also received 12.5 micron G PGF2 alpha at days 7 followibg GnRH injection. Sign of estrus was observed 9 days after GnRH injection. Statistical analysis was performed based on completely randomized design. Results showed that the injection of 300 micron g of GnRH that was followed by 12,5 microng of PGF2 was able to show obvious sign of post-partum oestrus, with sign of estrus appeared at oestrus rate of 27.8 hours, following PGF2 alpha injection, with 100 percent of pregnancy rate and 100 percent of calving rate.
